Package client

package client
  • Class
    Description
    AreaCreation
    To add a new area
    AreaInclude
    To add an existing area to the logged operator's center
    AreaInfo
    To view area info (also parameters info in GUI mode)
    CenterCreation
    To add a new center
    CenterInfo
    To view center info (also area inclusion if the operator is logged in GUI mode)
    Check
    The Check class is used to check whether a resource's parameter is compliant to the application or not.
    CheckMT
    The CheckMT class is used to check whether a resource's parameter is compliant to the application or not.
    ClientApp
     
    ClientLayer
     
    CommandType
    The CommandType class gives a list of the application's commands that can be used by a user
    Connection
    To show when the client is trying to connect to a server
    EditProfile
    To edit the operator's profile
    Handler
    The Handler class uses the singleton pattern and it is the center for all the common operations and variables.
    Help
    To show a list of commands or a simplified manual
    Login
    To login into the application
    Master
    The main view.
    ParameterCreation
    To add a new parameter
    ParameterInfo
    To show all the parameters based on an area.
    Proxy
    The proxy interface is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server
    ProxyImpl
    The proxy class is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server
    ProxyMT
    The proxyMT interface is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server.
    ProxyMTImpl
    The proxyMT class is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server.
    Registration
    To register into the application
    Resources
    The resources manager
    SearchArea
    To search an area
    SearchCenter
    To search a center
    Settings
    To change the application settings
    Verification
    To execute the verification code
    ViewType
    All the possible view states that the view can be
